HorrorMovies.title: Overlord
HorrorMovies.description: The story of two American soldiers behind enemy lines on D Day.
HorrorMovies.stars: Wyatt Russell, Pilou Asbæk, John Magaro

HorrorMovies.title: The First Purge
HorrorMovies.description: America's third political party, the New Founding Fathers of America, comes to power and conducts an experiment: no laws for 12 hours on Staten Island. No one has to stay on the island, but $5,000 is given to anyone who does.
HorrorMovies.stars: Y'lan Noel, Lex Scott Davis, Joivan Wade

HorrorMovies.title: The Strangers Pray At Night
HorrorMovies.description: A family of four staying at a secluded mobile home park for the night are stalked and then hunted by three masked psychopaths.
HorrorMovies.stars: Christina Hendricks, Martin Henderson, Bailee Madison

HorrorMovies.title: Winchester
HorrorMovies.description: Ensconced in her sprawling California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle.
HorrorMovies.stars: Helen Mirren, Sarah Snook, Finn Scicluna-O'Prey
